/scratch/muma/libs/nvhpc/Linux_x86_64/24.5/comm_libs/mpi/bin/mpicxx -cpp -lstdc++ -D_USE_NVTX -lnvToolsExt -cuda -Minfo=accel -gpu=cc86,cuda12.4,lineinfo -cuda -acc -cpp -lstdc++ -lnvToolsExt -acc -cuda -Minfo=accel -fast -fast -O3 CMakeFiles/example_2d.dir/example_2d.cpp.o -o example_2d  -Wl,-rpath,/scratch/junle/CODE_SOD2D/sod2d_gitlab/gpu_build_barce/external/gempa ../../libgempa.so
